atk-s0519a1:1_0: Evaṁ anekabhedavibhatte nettippakaraṇe yadidaṁ vuttaṁ “saṅgahavibhāgavāravasena duvidha”nti,
atk-s0519a1:1_2: Tassāpi “yaṁ loko pūjayate”ti ayaṁ gāthā ādi.
atk-s0519a1:2_0: Tattha lokiyanti ettha puññāpuññāni tabbipāko cāti loko, pajā,
atk-s0519a1:2_2: Loka-saddo hi jātisaddatāya sāmaññavasena niravasesato satte saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0519a1:2_4: pūjanakiriyāyogyabhūtatāvasena pana sattalokavacano eva idha gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0519a1:3_5: Atha vā issariyādhipaccena taṁtaṁsattalokassa pālanato rakkhaṇato khattiyacatumahārājasakkasuyāmasantusitasunimmitaparanimmitavasavattimahābrahmādayo lokapālā.
atk-s0519a1:3_6: Tehi saha taṁtaṁsattanikāyo salokapālo lokoti vutto.
atk-s0519a1:3_9: sukkā dhammā lokaṁ pālentī”ti vacanato hirottappadhammā lokapālā.
atk-s0519a1:3_11: Hirottappasampannā hi pāpagarahino sappurisā dhammacchandavantatāya bhagavati pūjānamakkāraparā hontīti.
atk-s0519a1:4_1: sadāti vā bhagavato dharamānakāle tato parañca.
atk-s0519a1:4_2: Atha vā sadāti abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva sāsanantaradhānā,
atk-s0519a1:4_4: Mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya hi mahābodhisattā bodhiyā niyatatāya buddhaṅkurabhūtā sadevakassa lokassa pūjanīyā ceva vandanīyā ca honti.
atk-s0519a1:8_0: Devā manussā asurā ca, abhivādetvāna pakkamu”nti. ;
atk-s0519a1:9_0: Namassati cāti keci kesañci pūjāsakkārādīni karontāpi tesaṁ apākaṭaguṇatāya namakkāraṁ na karonti,
atk-s0519a1:9_2: yathābhūtaabbhuggatakittisaddatāya pana bhagavantaṁ sadevako loko pūjayati ceva namassati cāti attho.
atk-s0519a1:9_5: Tassāti yaṁ sadevako loko pūjayati ceva namassati ca, tassa.
atk-s0519a1:9_6: Etanti idāni vattabbaṁ buddhiyaṁ viparivattamānaṁ sāmaññena dasseti.
atk-s0519a1:9_8: Tattha diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṁ satte sāsati vineti etenāti sāsanaṁ,
atk-s0519a1:9_9: tadeva ekantaniyyānaṭṭhena anaññasādhāraṇaguṇatāya ca uttamaṭṭhena taṁtaṁabhipatthitasamiddhihetutāya paṇḍitehi varitabbato vā varaṁ,
atk-s0519a1:9_11: Vidūhīti yathāsabhāvato kammakammaphalāni kusalādibhede ca dhamme vidantīti vidū,
atk-s0519a1:10_1: yo anaññasādhāraṇamahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiguṇavisesayogena sadevakena lokena pūjanīyo namassanīyo ca bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho,
atk-s0519a1:10_2: tassa loke uttamapuggalassa etaṁ idāni amhehi vibhajitabbahāranayapaṭṭhānavicāraṇavisayabhūtaṁ sāsanaṁ
atk-s0519a1:10_3: ādikalyāṇatādiguṇasampattiyā varaṁ aggaṁ uttamaṁ nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya paṇḍitavedanīyamevāti.
atk-s0519a1:10_10: Atha vā bhagavato sāsanaṁ pariññākkamena lakkhaṇāvabodhappaṭipattiyā suññatamukhādīhi ogāhitabbattā aviññūnaṁ supinantenapi na visayo hotīti āha –
atk-s0519a1:11_1: tesaṁ matena yaṁ-saddo sāsana-saddena samānādhikaraṇoti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0519a1:11_2: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti yaṁ sāsanavaraṁ salokapālo loko pūjayati namassati ca,
atk-s0519a1:11_7: Salokapāloti cettha lokapāla-saddo guṇībhūtopi satthuvisayattā sāsana-saddāpekkhatāya sāmibhāvena sambandhīvisesabhūto
atk-s0519a1:12_0: Kathaṁ pana sayaṁ dhammassāmī bhagavā dhammaṁ pūjayatīti?
atk-s0519a1:12_6: tameva dhammaṁ sakkatvā garuṁ katvā upanissāya vihareyya”nti.
atk-s0519a1:13_0: Api ca bhagavato dhammapūjanā sattasattāhappaṭipattiādīhi dīpetabbā.
atk-s0519a1:13_1: Dhammassāmīti ca dhammena sadevakassa lokassa sāmīti attho,
atk-s0519a1:13_6: Na hi namassatīti padassa namakkāraṁ karotīti ayameva attho,
atk-s0519a1:13_7: atha kho garukaraṇena tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāroti ayampi attho labbhati.
atk-s0519a1:13_8: Bhagavā ca dhammagarutāya sabbakālaṁ dhammaninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena viharatīti.
atk-s0519a1:13_9: Ayañca attho “yena sudaṁ svāhaṁ niccakappaṁ viharāmī”ti evamādīhi suttapadehi dīpetabbo.
atk-s0519a1:13_11: tassa paṇḍitehi saparasantānesu netabbaṁ pāpetabbanti attho.
atk-s0519a1:14_0: Evaṁ bhagavato sadevakassa lokassa pūjanīyavandanīyabhāvo aggapuggalabhāvo ca vuccamāno guṇavisiṭṭhataṁ dīpeti,
atk-s0519a1:14_4: Na hi savāsananiravasesakilesappahānaṁ anāvaraṇañāṇañca vinā tādisī dhammadesanā sambhavati.
atk-s0519a1:14_7: Etādisī ca guṇavibhūti mahākaruṇāpubbaṅgamaṁ abhinīhārasampattiṁ purassaraṁ katvā sampāditaṁ samattiṁsapāramisaṅkhātaṁ
atk-s0519a1:14_8: puññañāṇasambhāramantarena na upalabbhatīti hetusampadāpi atthato vibhāvitā hotīti evaṁ bhagavato tīsupi
atk-s0519a1:14_9: avatthāsu sabbasattānaṁ ekantahitappaṭilābhahetubhūtā ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā niravasesā buddhaguṇā
atk-s0519a1:15_0: Dutiyanaye pana yasmā sikkhattayasaṅgahaṁ saphalaṁ ariyamaggasāsanaṁ tassa ārammaṇabhūtañca amatadhātuṁ
atk-s0519a1:15_1: tadadhigamūpāyañca pubbabhāgapaṭipattisāsanaṁ tadatthaparidīpanañca pariyattisāsanaṁ yathārahaṁ saccābhisamayavasena
atk-s0519a1:15_2: abhisamento svākkhātatādiguṇavisesayuttataṁ manasikaronto sakkaccaṁ savanadhāraṇaparipucchādīhi paricayaṁ
atk-s0519a1:15_3: karonto ca sadevako loko pūjayati nāma.
atk-s0519a1:15_4: Lokanātho ca sammāsambodhippattiyā veneyyānaṁ sakkaccaṁ dhammadesanena “ariyaṁ vo,
atk-s0519a1:15_17: desessāmi ādikalyāṇa”ntiādīhi vacanehi thomanena ca pūjayati nāma.
atk-s0519a1:15_18: Tasmā sāsanavarassa pūjanīyabhāvo idha vuccamāno anavasesato dhammaguṇe dīpetīti ye ariyabhāvādayo niyyānādayo
atk-s0519a1:15_19: khayavirāgādayo madanimmadanādayo asaṅkhatādayo svākkhātatādayo ādikalyāṇatādayo ca anekehi suttapadehi
atk-s0519a1:15_21: te niravasesato imāya gāthāya pakāsitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0519a1:16_0: Yasmā pana ariyasaccappaṭivedhena samugghāṭitasammohāyeva paramatthato paṇḍitā bālyādisamatikkamanato,
atk-s0519a1:16_1: tasmā bhāvitalokuttaramaggā sacchikatasāmaññaphalā ca ariyapuggalā visesato vidūti vuccanti.
atk-s0519a1:16_2: Te hi yathāvuttasāsanavaraṁ aviparītato ñātuṁ netuñca saparasantāne sakkuṇantīti aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūhassa
atk-s0519a1:16_3: paramatthasaṅghassāpi idha gahitattā ye suppaṭipannatādayo anekehi suttapadehi saṁvaṇṇitā ariyasaṅghaguṇā,
atk-s0519a1:17_0: Evaṁ paṭhamagāthāya sātisayaṁ ratanattayaguṇaparidīpanaṁ katvā idāni –
atk-s0519a1:20_1: taṁ pana sikkhattayaṁ ñāṇavisesavisayabhāvabhedato avatthābhedato ca tividhaṁ hoti. Kathaṁ?
atk-s0519a1:20_3: Cintāmayañāṇagocaro ca yo ākāraparivitakkadiṭṭhinijjhānakkhantīhi gahetabbākāro vimuttāyatanaviseso “paṭipattisaddhammo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0519a1:20_5: Evaṁ tividhampi sāsanaṁ sāsanavaranti padena saṅgaṇhitvā tattha yaṁ paṭhamaṁ,
atk-s0519a1:20_6: taṁ itaresaṁ adhigamūpāyoti sabbasāsanamūlabhūtaṁ attano pakaraṇassa ca visayabhūtaṁ pariyattisāsanameva
atk-s0519a1:21_2: Tesu byañjanapadāni pajjati attho etehīti padāni.
atk-s0519a1:21_4: Ubhayampi vā ubhayathā yojetabbaṁ byañjanapadānampi aviparītaṁ paṭipajjitabbattā,
atk-s0519a1:21_6: tāni padāni parato pāḷiyaññeva āvi bhavissantīti tattheva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0519a1:24_4: Taṁ sabbanti taṁ “sutta”nti vuttaṁ sakalaṁ buddhavacanaṁ.
atk-s0519a1:24_5: Byañjanañca attho cāti byañjanañceva tadattho ca.
atk-s0519a1:24_9: tañca sabbaṁ atthato dvādasa padāni cha byañjanapadāni ceva cha atthapadāni cāti.
atk-s0519a1:24_16: Taṁ viññeyyaṁ ubhayanti yasmiṁ byañjane atthe ca vacanavacanīyabhāvena sambandhe suttavohāro,
atk-s0519a1:24_17: tadubhayaṁ sarūpato viññātabbaṁ tattha katamaṁ byañjanaṁ katamo atthoti?
atk-s0519a1:25_0: Evaṁ “sāsanavara”nti vuttassa suttassa pariyattibhāvaṁ tassa ca atthabyañjanapadabhāvena veditabbataṁ
atk-s0519a1:25_1: dassetvā idāni tassa pavicayupāyaṁ nettippakaraṇaṁ padatthavibhāgena dassetuṁ “soḷasahārā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0519a1:26_4: Hāranayamūlapadāni eva hi saṅkhepato vitthārato ca bhāsitāni nettīti.
atk-s0519a1:26_14: Ayañca gāthā nettiṁ saṅgāyantehi pakaraṇatthasaṅgaṇhanavasena ṭhapitāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0519a1:26_17: hārādisamudāyabhūtāyaṁ nettiyaṁ byañjanatthasamudāye ca sutte kiṁ kena viciyatīti vicāraṇāyaṁ āha –
atk-s0519a1:27_0: Tattha soḷasapi hārā mūlapadaniddhāraṇamantarena byañjanamukheneva suttassa saṁvaṇṇanā honti,
atk-s0519a1:27_1: na nayā viya mūlapadasaṅkhātasabhāvadhammaniddhāraṇamukhenāti te “byañjanavicayo suttassā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0519a1:27_2: Atthanayā pana yathāvuttaatthamukheneva suttassa atthasampaṭipattiyā hontīti āha –
atk-s0519a1:27_7: Ubhayaṁ pariggahītanti hārā nayā cāti etaṁ ubhayaṁ suttassa atthaniddhāraṇavasena parisamantato gahitaṁ sabbathā sutte yojitaṁ.
atk-s0519a1:27_14: Nettinayena hi saṁvaṇṇetuṁ asakkuṇeyyaṁ nāma suttaṁ natthīti.
atk-s0519a1:28_2: tattha nettisaṁvaṇṇanāya visayabhūtaṁ pariyattidhammameva pakārantarena niyametvā dassetuṁ “yā cevā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0519a1:29_3: Tadubhayañca vimuttāyatanasīsena paricayaṁ karontānaṁ anupādāparinibbānapariyosānānaṁ sampattīnaṁ hetubhāvato ekantena viññeyyaṁ,
atk-s0519a1:29_4: tadubhayavinimuttassa vā ñeyyassa abhāvato tadeva dvayaṁ viññeyyanti imamatthaṁ dasseti yā ceva…pe…
atk-s0519a1:29_8: Ayamānupubbīti ayaṁ vakkhamānā anupubbi hāranayānaṁ anukkamo,
atk-s0519a1:29_12: Sāmiatthe vā etaṁ paccattaṁ navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhiyā anupubbīti.
atk-s0519a1:29_15: yathāvuttavijānane sādhetabbe vakkhamānāya hāranayānupubbiyā ayaṁ navavidhasuttantassa atthapariyesanāti.
atk-s0519a1:30_2: suttabhāve ca tesaṁ kathaṁ sāsanassa navaṅgabhāvo.
atk-s0519a1:30_5: tathā ca sati suttaṅgameva na siyā.
atk-s0519a1:33_0: Sabbassāpi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṁ sāmaññavidhi.
atk-s0519a1:33_1: Tathā hi “ettakaṁ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṁ suttapariyāpannaṁ,
atk-s0519a1:33_3: sakavāde pañca suttasatānī”tiādivacanato vinayābhidhammapariyattivisesepi suttavohāro dissati.
atk-s0519a1:33_4: Tadekadesesu pana geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0519a1:33_6: Lokepi hi sasilokaṁ sagāthakaṁ cuṇṇiyaganthaṁ geyya”nti vadanti.
atk-s0519a1:33_7: Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchitvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa.
atk-s0519a1:33_10: Evaṁ sante sagāthakādīnampi pañhāvissajjanavasena pavattānaṁ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti?
atk-s0519a1:33_13: Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṁ gāthābandhesu sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāyuttesu “vuttañheta”ntiādivacanasambandhesu
atk-s0519a1:33_14: abbhutadhammapaṭisaṁyuttesu ca suttavisesesu yathākkamaṁ gāthāudānaitivuttakaabbhutadhammasaññā patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0519a1:33_15: tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā.
atk-s0519a1:33_16: Satipi pañhāvissajjanabhāve sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti
atk-s0519a1:33_17: evaṁ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyaṅgādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo
atk-s0519a1:34_3: niggāthakaṁ suttaṁ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṁ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthā evāti?
atk-s0519a1:34_6: Sodhitañhi pubbe gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittanti.
atk-s0519a1:34_8: “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṁ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, tampi na,
atk-s0519a1:34_11: na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṁsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni,
atk-s0519a1:35_0: Yaṁ pana vuttaṁ “sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā”ti,
atk-s0519a1:35_4: Sahabhāvo ca nāma atthato aññena hoti,
atk-s0519a1:35_5: na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttappadeso atthi.
atk-s0519a1:35_7: na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi.
atk-s0519a1:35_13: Ato na tāhi ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṁ geyyaṅgabhāvoti evaṁ suttādīnaṁ aṅgānaṁ aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0519a1:35_14: Yasmā pana sabbampi buddhavacanaṁ yathāvuttanayena atthānaṁ sūcanādiatthena suttantveva vuccati,
